content: ```html;kv-decr ``` When passed a key, will remove that key from the key-value storage. If there is no key with the given name in the key-value storage, nothing will happen. ## Syntax ```js puter.kv.del(key) ``` ## Parameters #### `key` (String) (required) A string containing the name of the key you want to remove. ## Return value A `Promise` that will resolve to `true` when the key has been removed. ## Examples Delete the key 'name' ```html;kv-del ``` Will remove all key-value pairs from the user's key-value store for the current app. ## Syntax ```js puter.kv.flush() ``` ## Parameters None ## Return value
